summary: Seven girls become good friends in high school, then events pull them apart for 25 years. When one of the friends lies dying in a hospital, she wishes to see each of them one last time.
cast: Ho-jeong Yu|Eun-kyung Shim|Hee-kyung Jin|Min-yeong Kim|Su-hee Go|So-ra Kang|Yeon-kyeong Lee|Bo-ra Nam|Sun-kyung Kim|Bo-mi Kim|Jin-hee Hong|Park Jin-Joo|Hyo-Rin Min|Yeong-seo Park|Seung-hyeon Han|Shi-hoo Kim|Jong-hak Baek|Woo-hee Chun|Choon-ha Hwang|Seok-yong Jeong|Rae-yeon Kang|Kyeong-yeong Lee|Hee-Jung So|Kim Ye-Won
title: Sseo-ni
